text.title: Nigeria allies join fight against Boko Haram
text.head: Nigeria allies join fight against Boko Haram
Sources

list.item: Madjiasra Nako and Abdoulaye Massalaki. "Chad, Niger launch joint offensive against Boko Haram in Nigeria" — Reuters , March 8, 2015
"Boko Haram conflict: Nigerian allies launch offensive" — BBC News Online , March 8, 2015
AFP. "Niger, Chad attack Boko Haram after IS pledge of allegiance" — Daily Mail , March 8, 2015
